H0.text: Planting more trees is an example of how humans negatively impact the environment.

H1.text: Burning less fossil fuel is an example of how humans negatively impact the environment.

H2.text: Reducing beach erosion is an example of how humans negatively impact the environment.

H3.text: Increasing water runoff is an example of how humans negatively impact the environment, illustrating the many ways humans can affect the environment.

A4.text: Consequently, these high concentrations of urban runoff result in high levels of pollutants discharged from storm sewers to surface waters.

A5.text: Urban runoff is being recognized as a cause of pollution in its own right.
